name: Spicy Avocado Sauce for Tacos
description: This creamy and spicy avocado sauce is great for dipping flautas or for topping your everyday tacos. It is traditionally served with flautas or taquitos, but it would also make a great addition to some vegan enchiladas.
recipeIngredient: 2  Avocados, large, seed removed, (flesh scooped out)
1/2 cup Liquid from Mexican Pickled Jalapeños ((see note))

recipeInstructions.text: Blend all the ingredients until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend all the ingredients until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Season to taste with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Season to taste with salt and pepper.
